description: This file defines an API for ASN.1 public key objects, including creation functions for various key types such as RSA, DSA, and DH, as well as key pair structures. It provides function prototypes for creating ASN.1 key objects used in cryptographic operations.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreatePublicKey
methods.description: Creates a new ASN.1 PublicKey object, which can be of type DSA or RSA.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateRSAPublicKey
methods.description: Creates a new ASN.1 RSA PublicKey object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateDSAPublicKey
methods.description: Creates a new ASN.1 DSA PublicKey object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateDHPublicKey
methods.description: Creates a new ASN.1 DH PublicKey object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateKeyPair
methods.description: Creates a new ASN.1 KeyPair object containing key type, public key, and private key.
